name: Circo:Dark Story
description:
Circo:Dark Story is a pixel action RPG game.Your goal - discover your past in the Kingdom Ruins and defeat the Emperor of Darkness who wants to cover the whole world with darkness!

Solve the riddles!

Defeat the bosses!

Learn more about this world and its inhabitants!

Go through five chapters with different locations:Ancient Ruins,Dark Forests,Carnaval City,Deep Mines,The Storage!
